description: Manual translation overrides for quality control. These take precedence over cache and API results.

es.One-Piece Speed Cushions: Cojines reductores de velocidad de una pieza
es.Two-Piece Speed Cushions: Cojines reductores de velocidad de dos piezas

notes.de: German traffic management terminology should use proper compound words
notes.es: Spanish should avoid anglicisms like 'Speed' mixed with Spanish words
notes.fr: French terms should be consistent with European traffic standards
